properties.title: Swarm Space Weather – Variability of Ionospheric Plasma (Swarm VIP)
properties.description: In the project Swarm satellite data and other datasets are used to determine determine the dominant scales in the ionosphere at different geomagnetic conditions and create a semi-empiric dynamic model of the ionosphere.
properties.osc:name: 4DIONOSPHERE (SWARM VIP)
osc:consortium: GMV INNOVATING SOLUTIONS SP. Z O.O. (PL)
ISTITUTO NAZIONALE DI GEOFISICA E VULCANOLOGIA (IT)
